video.title: Grounded for Life
video.synopsis: Now in their 30s, a working-class Irish Catholic couple who had their first child at age 18 faces the challenges of raising a big family.

episodes.synopsis: When Sean spots Lily making out with Brad in his car, he throws fried chicken at the windshield. Meanwhile, Eddie attempts to steal cable.
episodes.title: Lily B. Goode

episodes.synopsis: Sean finds a fake ID while in Lily's room but can't really punish her for it since he wasn't supposed to be there in the first place.
episodes.title: In My Room

episodes.synopsis: When a trip to a Ramones concert interferes with Jimmy's homework, the excuse note that Sean writes for him results in Jimmy's suspension.
episodes.title: I Wanna Be Suspended

episodes.synopsis: Sean is called to school when Lily's skirt breaks the dress code, and Jimmy believes he's the victim of demonic possession.
episodes.title: Devil with a Plaid Skirt

episodes.synopsis: After telling Sean that she was going to dinner with a friend, Lily must call Sean for a ride from her real destination, Action Mountain theme park.
episodes.title: Action Mountain High

episodes.synopsis: When Sean receives his mother's inheritance, the family hopes for a much-needed water heater, but he splurges on an expensive guitar.
episodes.title: You Can't Always Get What You Want

episodes.synopsis: A mother-daughter trip to New Jersey ends in disaster when Claudia tells some cheerleaders from Lily's school that Lily is a virgin.
episodes.title: Like a Virgin

episodes.synopsis: When he keeps putting off taking Henry to the barber shop, Sean eventually has to cut Henry's hair himself.
episodes.title: Devil's Haircut

episodes.synopsis: Sean refuses to help Eddie hook up with a woman because of what happened the last time: Eddie pretended to be dead rather than break up.
episodes.title: Eddie's Dead

episodes.synopsis: Sean's blunder at a ball game sends a horde of angered Yankees fans to the house, where Claudia is hosting a wedding shower for a friend.
episodes.title: Catch Us If You Can

episodes.synopsis: Walt gets his just deserts when he gives Jimmy a BB gun for his birthday: he ends up in the hospital with an embarrassing BB wound.
episodes.title: Jimmy's Got a Gun

episodes.synopsis: While Sean and Claudia work overtime to save for a vacation, the kids take advantage of their absence through piercings, bullying and panhandling.
episodes.title: Jimmy Was Kung-Fu Fighting

episodes.synopsis: Sean faces an ethical challenge when he referees for Henry's soccer team. Meanwhile, Lily falls for the guy who runs the soccer concession stand.
episodes.title: Loser

episodes.synopsis: When Lily's dance team's big number is pulled from the talent show lineup, Sean makes a deal to get it reinstated but soon wishes he hadn't.
episodes.title: Mrs. Finnerty, You've Got a Lovely Daughter

episodes.synopsis: When Lily learns that she was born before her parents were married, Sean and Claudia tell her the story of her birth.
episodes.title: Love Child

episodes.synopsis: The family car goes missing and Eddie convinces Claudia to file an inflated insurance claim until the car reappears, battered and missing parts.
episodes.title: Baby You Can't Drive My Car

episodes.synopsis: Sean's jealousy is ignited when Claudia has a sexy dream about Eddie, while a resentful Jimmy tricks Lily and pal Alison into drinking boozy cider.
episodes.title: Dream On

episodes.synopsis: Claudia and Sean disagree about how to handle Jimmy's computer porn, while Lily and Jimmy get in hot water over a doctored photo of Sister Helen.
episodes.title: Don't Let Me Download

episodes.synopsis: Aware that nerdy Brad just bought condoms from the local drugstore, Sean and Claudia go into panic mode when Lily attends a bash at Brad's house.
episodes.title: Rubber Sold

episodes.synopsis: Sean and Eddie re-form their high school band to play at Claudia's friend's wedding, but when Lily shows interest in the new drummer, plans go awry.
episodes.title: Bang on the Drum

episodes.synopsis: Claudia tries to keep her stress-fueled smoking habit a secret from the disapproving Sean, while Lily's carelessness creates havoc with a new crush.
episodes.title: Smoke on the Daughter

episodes.synopsis: Holiday chaos ensues when Sean fights with Santa Walt for promising Henry a pricey toy, and Lily can't figure out which admirer gave her boxer shorts.
episodes.title: I Saw Daddy Hitting Santa Claus

episodes.synopsis: Sean talks sex with Henry after Henry catches his parents making love on his bed, but his words backfire when Henry tells what happened at school.
episodes.title: Let's Talk About Sex, Henry

episodes.synopsis: It's poker night at the Finnertys', but Walt is moping after being jilted, Eddie is nursing wounds from a fight, and Lily is brooding about Brad.
episodes.title: Is She Really Going Out With Walt?

episodes.synopsis: Sean fears Mafia-style retribution after a favor for Claudia's dicey uncle ends badly, while Brad's interest in Lily heats up under broken plumbing.
episodes.title: We Are Family

episodes.synopsis: Sean's attempts to help the failing Jimmy ace his robot science fair project backfire, while Walt is confounded by a box of lobsters from Eddie.
episodes.title: Mr. Roboto

episodes.synopsis: While attempting tree pruning, Sean causes a blackout during the Super Bowl and spies Lily in her bedroom, seemingly engaged in illegal activities.
episodes.title: Don't Fear the Reefer

episodes.synopsis: Sean's plans for a water park outing fall apart when he finds that Lily has maxed out his credit cards. Eddie stays mum about his mystery locker box.
episodes.title: Take It to the Limit

episodes.synopsis: Claudia becomes enraged upon hearing a rumor that her breasts aren't entirely real, and Eddie concocts a dubious plan to get Sean boxing again.
episodes.title: Eddie Said Knock You Out

episodes.synopsis: As Sean and Claudia chaperone Lily's 10th grade dance, Sister Helen catches Lily with Dean and some alcohol. Meanwhile, Walt acts as Eddie's henchman.
episodes.title: Safety Dance

episodes.synopsis: To keep his own blabbing a secret, Sean tries to talk a gay co-worker into coming out, while a jealous Lily battles rivals for Dean's affections.
episodes.title: Relax

episodes.synopsis: When Sean and Claudia win a trip to Atlantic City, they reluctantly leave the kids with Eddie, whose vigilant baby-sitting hits some unexpected bumps.
episodes.title: The Kids Are Alright

episodes.synopsis: During an argument, Sean catches a St. Finnian nun cursing and uses the discovery to get Claudia and the kids all they've ever wanted from the school.
episodes.title: Swearin' to God

episodes.synopsis: After buying diamond earrings for Claudia from one of Eddie's shady cohorts, Sean winds up in jail. Lily protests the nuns' donkey basketball game.
episodes.title: Eddie and This Guy With Diamonds

episodes.synopsis: A week of insults from Claudia's visiting parents drives Sean to distraction, while Lily and Brad share a romantic moment with the karaoke machine.
episodes.title: I Fought the In-Laws

episodes.synopsis: Sean and Eddie's scheme to scatter their late cousin's ashes over the old water tower hits a snag at his wake. Lily flirts with a cute funeral guest.
episodes.title: Dust in the Wind

episodes.synopsis: Sean finds a pregnancy test in the trash and assumes it's Lily's, while Dean disappoints Lily at the tattoo parlor and a huge zit torments Jimmy.
episodes.title: Oops!...I Did It Again

episodes.synopsis: Claudia gets a double-dose of bad news when Sean tells her he quit his job and bought a bar. But, hey, at least she isn't pregnant.
episodes.title: We Didn't Start the Fire

episodes.synopsis: When a cash-strapped Sean is forced to ask Claudia's dad for money, it's just as humiliating as he expected.
episodes.title: Mustang Lily

episodes.synopsis: Sean and Eddie hire a hot girl from Sean and Claudia's high school to tend bar. To top it off, she was Claudia's arch nemesis.
episodes.title: Cat Scratch Fever

episodes.synopsis: When Lily bombs her driver's test, Eddie offers to help her pass and Brad offers to drive her around. Claudia takes a video game away from the boys.
episodes.title: Drive Me Crazy

episodes.synopsis: Eddie holds a yard sale in Sean's yard. Meanwhile, Brad is frustrated that Lily's still with Dean, but Eddie urges him to be patient.
episodes.title: Just Like a Woman

episodes.synopsis: Henry plays the role of "anti-druglord" and keeps close tabs on the family. Claudia develops a roll of film and discovers Sean's been keeping secrets.
episodes.title: Henry's Been Working for the Drug Squad

episodes.synopsis: After vowing he'd get a vasectomy, Sean has second thoughts. Meanwhile, Brad is paying Lily to tutor him in calculus even though he doesn't need help.
episodes.title: Cuts Like a Knife

episodes.synopsis: Sean tries to get to the bottom of Jimmy's shoplifting incident. Meanwhile, a nervous Lily is terrified to meet Dean's parents.
episodes.title: Who Are You?

episodes.synopsis: When the local paper gives the pub a bad review, Eddie pulls out all the stops to have it retracted. Meanwhile, Lily gets a job to pay off her debts.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Working Week

episodes.synopsis: Sean milks the Finnertys' health insurance for all it's worth. Meanwhile, Lily asks Eddie to find out what Dean got her for her birthday.
episodes.title: Claudia in Disguise (With Glasses)

episodes.synopsis: Sean throws Lily a Sweet 16 bash, but she's got big plans for romance with Dean. Henry and Jimmy decide to test Sean's parenting skills.
episodes.title: Tonight's the Night

episodes.synopsis: When Sean joins Grampa's Knights' Lodge so Lily can compete in a beauty pagent, Claudia becomes obsessed with Lily winning.
episodes.title: Oh, What a Knight

episodes.synopsis: Lily and Brad join forces to find Grampa a girlfriend and get him out of the house. Eddie struggles to tell Nicole he has feelings for her.
episodes.title: Part Time Lover

episodes.synopsis: Sean learns that Claudia and Eddie withheld information from him because he's prone to rage, so he tries to prove to them that he isn't.
episodes.title: Your Father Should Know: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Tensions brew between Brad and Sean, and Brad's dad gets on Sean's nerves. To smooth things out, Claudia invites the O'Keefes to dinner.
episodes.title: Your Father Should Know: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Lily must break the news to Dean that she is leaving him for Brad; Sean reacts nervously when Claudia comes home early -- and Eddie gives him reason.
episodes.title: All the Young Nudes

episodes.synopsis: Eddie receives a delivery of putrid crème de menthe that he cannot return, and Claudia tries to sell it; Sean teaches Brad how to be a cool boyfriend.
episodes.title: I Right the Wrongs

episodes.synopsis: Lily wants Brad to take her on the romantic date that never happened; Eddie breaks a window and is tasked to replace it.
episodes.title: I Just Paid to Say I Love You

episodes.synopsis: When Lily announces that college is not for her, Claudia issues a challenge. Can Lily beat her score on the SAT exams?
episodes.title: SAT and Sympathy

episodes.synopsis: Eddie gets an "eco-friendly" electric car, but his motives are not all green; Lily wants Claudia to give her money to get her "Dean" tattoo removed.
episodes.title: Pay You Back with Interest

episodes.synopsis: When Lily tries in vain try hide her first hangover, Sean assumes the worst and decides to sell her car, prompting Lily to retaliate.
episodes.title: Ticket to Ride

episodes.synopsis: As Jimmy reaches puberty, Sean wants to have the father-son chat that he and Eddie never had with their father, which stirs up sibling rivalries.
episodes.title: Smells Like Teen Spirit

episodes.synopsis: When Claudia tells Sean a photographer approached her, they argue over the man's intentions, causing her to storm out before her guests arrive.
episodes.title: Baby Come Back

episodes.synopsis: When the bar gets robbed and Eddie flashes extra cash, he becomes a suspect; Lily wants to "explore her options" when she meets a cool guy.
episodes.title: Been Caught Stealing

episodes.synopsis: Brad accidentally sees Claudia naked and things get awkward when Lily finds out. Eddie hires a bodyguard whom he fears too much to fire.
episodes.title: (She's Got) Kegs

episodes.synopsis: When Brad invites Dean and his new girlfriend to Lily's party, Lily strives to impress; Eddie takes a shot at performing stand-up comedy at the pub.
episodes.title: My Ex-Boyfriend's Back

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy calls a sex line and must account for the huge phone bill; Brad visits his grandmother; Sean is at fault when Claudia flubs her midterm exam.
episodes.title: Communication Breakdown

episodes.synopsis: Eddie helps Henry with a science project; Claudia fumes over Sean's anniversary reservation at a motel that offers a porn film shot at their house.
episodes.title: All Apologies

episodes.synopsis: When Sean and Claudia get a free in-house massage, Brad takes Lily to a school dance, and Eddie babysits Jimmy and Henry -- but can the privacy last?
episodes.title: I Think We're Alone Now

episodes.synopsis: Sean finds a pair of Brad's underpants in the family laundry and flies into a rage, until he learns about the school's abstinence pledge.
episodes.title: Can't Get Next to You

episodes.synopsis: The O'Keefes invite Lily along on their vacation, but when Sean learns that Mr. O'Keefe has serious tennis skills, he can't help but challenge him.
episodes.title: Racketman

episodes.synopsis: Brad's parents are divorcing, so to lift his spirits, Lily tries to give him a perfect birthday party -- a hard feat to pull off at the Finnerty home.
episodes.title: Me and Mrs. O

episodes.synopsis: Claudia hires a photographer to take a family portrait, but Sean and Lily see a different picture; visiting his mother's grave gives Eddie the blues.
episodes.title: Tombstone Blues

episodes.synopsis: Eddie is happy with Hope, but his clingy ex has something on him that Eddie doesn't want Hope to see; Jimmy finds the perfect girl -- or has he?
episodes.title: Pictures of Willy

episodes.synopsis: With business lagging, Sean declares that unless St. Patrick's Day is profitable, they will sell the bar; Brad's science club competes for a prize.
episodes.title: It's Hard to Be a Saint in the City

episodes.synopsis: Sean sees Henry's new friend Ryan for what he is -- a spoiled brat; Brad's friends get on Lily's nerves; Claudia spies Eddie with a mystery woman.
episodes.title: Beat on the Brat

episodes.synopsis: Lily scores an A+ on her English essay while Claudia gets an F; when a girl comes on to Jimmy, he worries about his inexperience and turns to Eddie.
episodes.title: The Cheat Is On

episodes.synopsis: Eddie gets audited by the IRS; Claudia's father comes for a visit and a major operation -- for reasons undisclosed -- at the city hospital.
episodes.title: You're So Vain

episodes.synopsis: When Sean is diagnosed with high blood pressure, Claudia tries to shield him from stressful information, but the kids don't make that easy.
episodes.title: Pressure Drop

episodes.synopsis: Eddie holds on to Hope; Brad's job impedes his relationship with Lily; Sean hires his unemployable dad; Claudia struggles with Jimmy's puberty.
episodes.title: Get a Job

episodes.synopsis: Eddie's relationship with Hope hangs by a thread; Brad boasts about a girlfriend from his summers at space camp, but nobody believes him.
episodes.title: Space Camp Odditty

episodes.synopsis: Lily decides to get even with Brad for being unfaithful; Sean intercepts a call from Claudia's doctor and withholds important news.
episodes.title: The Policy of Truth

episodes.synopsis: Lily and Brad make up; Eddie tries to make amends to a girl he dumped; Jimmy wants to impress a new neighbor; Sean has a sympathetic pregnancy.
episodes.title: Man, I Feel Like a Woman

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy spies on Taya, and Lily joins in; Sean flips when he finds out Eddie is forgoing their Garage Band Monday because of Faye.
episodes.title: One Is the Loneliest Number

episodes.synopsis: Lily resents that Brad's Taya will be the first girl on the football team; Eddie moves into Sean's basement; pregnancy challenges Claudia's routine.
episodes.title: Day Tripper

episodes.synopsis: Lily's crush prompts her to sign up for a program where she gets a "kid sister"; Sean wins at gambling and buys a big TV -- to Claudia's chagrin.
episodes.title: You Better You Bet

episodes.synopsis: Sean and Claudia clash about learning the baby's gender; Lily runs against Brad for student council; Eddie's shrink makes a surprising discovery.
episodes.title: Psycho Therapy

episodes.synopsis: Lily learns she'll have to share her room with the baby during her breaks from college; Sean tries to arrange a gig at school for an old friend.
episodes.title: I'm Looking Through You

episodes.synopsis: Claudia gets fired and starts working from home; a big chain opens a bar nearby, and Sean interviews for a manager's job; Brad breaks up with Taya.
episodes.title: Mystery Dance

episodes.synopsis: When Claudia no longer feels sexy, Sean devises a plan; Brad enlists Jimmy in the science club; Lily helps Eddie with material for his stand-up gig.
episodes.title: Do Ya Think I'm Sexy?

episodes.synopsis: Sean fills in as a limo driver and finds unexpected benefits; Lily refuses to accept that she is not Yale material; Eddie coaches Jimmy for a play.
episodes.title: Tom Sawyer

episodes.synopsis: Lily gives Brad a wish list for their upcoming anniversary; Sean decides to defy the homeowners' association; someone has a dark secret.
episodes.title: The Letter(s)

episodes.synopsis: Eddie's ex hits pay dirt with nude photos of him, so Sean pushes Eddie to sell the bar to her. Jimmy fills in for an injured male cheerleader.
episodes.title: Crazy

episodes.synopsis: With the new Finnerty ready to arrive, Sean and Claudia have to rush to the hospital, which means missing Lily's graduation.
episodes.title: Hello, Goodbye
